original_text:
She brought up one of her cubs,
    and he became a strong lion.
He learned to tear the prey
    and he became a man-eater.
korean_text: 그 새끼 하나를 키우매 젊은 사자가 되어 먹이 물어뜯기를 배워 사람을 삼키매

sentences.original_text: She brought up one of her cubs
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 그녀의 새끼 중 하나를 키웠다

sentences.original_text: and he became a strong lion
He learned to tear the prey

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 사람을 잡아먹는 자가 되었다
